name: Snake For Money
description:
Did you ever tell yourself I'm so good at snake I could do it as a job?

Well now you can.

Bringing you the newest snake game - Snake For Money. Combining the smoothest snake game play and giving you a chance to be paid to relive your childhood.

Snakes 4 Money is a two player game, where the aim is to collect as many balls as possible to achieve the highest score. Whoever collects the most is the winner.

Features

¤ REAL MONEY GAME:Cash prizes against other players around the world.

¤ FREE COINS DAILY: Collect your virtual bonus every day.

¤ FREE GIFTS: Receive special bonuses and promotions.

¤ INSTANT WORLDWIDE PLAY: Choose a board and play immediately against players from all over the world

¤ BEAUTIFUL AND UNIQUE UI: A chic and classy design.


Apple is not associated with or responsible for any contests within this app.
